WRITING.TEXT: I hate how they did the whole Corbin isn't cleared to compete in the Survivor Series Men's Match but yet he's perfectly healthy and fine to run in here. Continuity is not a bad thing WWE, don't be scared of it.

WRITING.TITLE: Post Survivor Series Match Discussion: Tag Team Survivor Series Elimination Match - Team Raw Vs. Team Smackdown
WRITING.TEXT:
Sheamus Cesaro win for Team Raw after last eliminating The Usos
Sole Survivors: Cesaro Sheamus
Order of elimination:
- Breezango when Kofi pinned Fandango after Midnight Hour - The New Day after Jimmy Uso pinned Kofi with a superkick - The Hype Bros when Gallows Anderson hit Magic Killer and Gallows pins Ryder - The Shining Stars after Primo is pinned by Jason Jordan after an avalanche bulldog from American Alpha - American Alpha when Jason Jordan was pinned by Karl Anderson after Magic Killer - Gallows Anderson after Rhino pins Luke Gallows with a Gore - Heath Slater Enzo Amore after Enzo pins Rhino with BadaBoom-Shakalaka - Enzo Amore Big Cass when Jey Uso pins Enzo after the flying splash - The Usos when Jey Uso submits to Cesaro's Sharpshooter

WRITING.TITLE: Post Survivor Series Match Discussion: Intercontinental Championship Match - The Miz (c) Vs. Sami Zayn
WRITING.TEXT:
The Miz wins via roll up after Maryse distracted the referee by ringing the bell while Zayn had Miz in the figure four.
Montreal strikes in Toronto! It'll never die.

WRITING.TITLE: Post Survivor Series Match Discussion: Women's Survivor Series Elimination Match - Team Raw Vs. Team Smackdown
WRITING.TEXT:
Team Raw wins after Bayley hits Bayley to Belly on Becky Lynch
Survivors: Bayley Charlotte
Natalya replaced Nikki Bella when Nikki was found attacked backstage.
Order of elimination:
- Carmella by Alicia Fox after a scissor kick - Alicia Fox by Alexa Bliss after Twisted Bliss - Naomi via countout after Nia Jax rammed her head into the ringpost and flung her from the apron to the floor - Sasha Banks by Natalya with a rollup - Natalya by Charlotte after a big boot - Nia Jax after submitting to Becky Lynch's Disarmer. - Alexa Bliss by Charlotte after a big boot - Becky Lynch by Bayley after Bayley to Belly

WRITING.TITLE: Post Survivor Series Match Discussion: Kane Vs. Luke Harper
WRITING.TEXT: Kane wins via chokeslam.

WRITING.TITLE: Post Survivor Series Match Discussion: Ariya Daivari Drew Gulak Tony Nese Vs. Noam Dar Rich Swann TJ Perkins
WRITING.TEXT: Noam Dar Rich Swann TJ Perkins win after Swann hit the Standing 450 on Daivari.

WRITING.TITLE: Post NXT TakeOver Match Discussion: NXT Championship Match - Samoa Joe Vs. Shinsuke Nakamura (c)
WRITING.TEXT:
Samoa Joe wins via Muscle Buster after hitting the STO to the stairs on the outside. NEW CHAMPION!
Nakamura breaking all the eyes.

WRITING.TITLE: Post NXT TakeOver: Toronto Match Discussion: NXT Women's Championship Match - Mickie James Vs. Asuka (c)
WRITING.TEXT: Asuka wins via submission with the cross face chicken wing.
Dash and Dawson trying to hold each others hands to not tap while in the double submission was such a fantastic touch. Great storytelling, great great great tag team psychology.

WRITING.TITLE: Post NXT TakeOver: Toronto Match Discussion: 2 out of 3 Falls NXT Tag Team Championship Match - #DIY Vs. The Revival (c)
WRITING.TEXT:
DIY win two falls to one when Dash Wilder taps out to Johnny Gargano's trap arm crossface. NEW CHAMPIONS.
The Revival won the first fall when Dash Wilder pins Johnny Gargano after Shatter Machine.
DIY won the second fall when Ciampa pinned Dawson after the Superkick and knee combination.
(Absolutely incredible match.)

WRITING.TITLE: Post NXT TakeOver: Toronto Match Discussion: Dusty Rhodes Tag Team Classic Finals - Authors Of Pain Vs. TM61
WRITING.TEXT:
Authors Of Pain win via Last Chapter on Shane Thorne.
Also a steel chain flew into the crowd. SOUVENIRS!

WRITING.TITLE: Post NXT TakeOver: Toronto Match Discussion: Bobby Roode Vs. Tye Dillinger
WRITING.TEXT: Bobby Roode wins via Implant DDT after running Tye's shoulder into the post.
It's just the stupidest shit ever. I have to now go on Stubhub and pay $250+ for seats that I assume were the $35 ones and be able to rest my head on the back of the stadium.
This is the first time I've ever seen Ticketmaster take price ranges off, they took the three prices under 160 off to search completely. I fucking HATE this company.

WRITING.TITLE: Survivor Series 2017 Details Already Announced - 11/19/2017 Houston, Texas
WRITING.TEXT:
The Houston Chronicle is reporting that the 2017 WWE Survivor Series will be held in Houston, Texas at the Toyota Center on Sunday 11/19/17 with tickets going on sale almost a year in advance on 12/9 at 10 AM.
The Chronicle is also reporting that WWE will run a NXT Takeover the night before as well as Raw and Smackdown Live tapings the following nights after the PPV, running the Toyota Center four back to back nights.
Next year's edition will be the 30th anniversary of the Survivor Series, which became the company's second regular PPV event following Wrestlemania.
Source: http://www.chron.com/entertainment/article/WWE-announces-Survivor-Series-for-Houston-10618215.php
http://pwinsider.com/article/106049/survivor-series-2017-details-announced.html?p=1

WRITING.TITLE: WON: Update on Shawn Michaels role at the Performance Center and structure of other coaches
WRITING.TEXT: [removed]

WRITING.TITLE: WON: Update on Marty Scurll and Will Ospreay's ROH deals and status elsewhere
WRITING.TEXT: ROH announced the contract signings of Marty Scurll and Will Ospreay. Wed reported both a long time back, but the delay was likely due to them having to get the visas taken care of. They were described as exclusive deals, but that was just for the U.S. market. Ospreay will continue to work New Japan as his main outlet and work here when he isnt booked on tours. New Japan wanted Ospreay to work for ROH in the U.S. since the two sides work together well on dates, once it became clear Ospreay was in demand by Evolve and other groups as well. Scurll signed what I believe was a one-year deal, but both sides were said to have an escape clause at the six month mark. The deals will allow both to work in the U.K., although both will probably be working a lot less there, and they can still work PWG
Miserably.
That's what I was thinking. He started with WWE very shortly after this. This is from 4/1/06 and he debuted on the 5/26/06 Smackdown.

WRITING.TITLE: Is this Hornswoggle in the front row at RoH in 2006?
WrestleCon Supershow shifts to Friday, March 31 to move away from NXT Takeover
WRITING.TEXT:
CZW will now run opposite NXT Takeover, while the Supershow will run head to head with the WWE Hall Of Fame.
Wrestlecon will be offering refunds for fans who cannot attend the rescheduled CZW and Wrestlecon Supershow events until 12/1.
For details, visit www.wrestlecon.com.
I keep running into a lot of Fresno Redditors these days. I live here now as well.

WRITING.TITLE: Austin Aries injury expected to keep him out till first quarter 2017.
WRITING.TEXT:
From PWInsider.com:
PWInsider.com has confirmed that WWE NXT star Austin Aries has suffered a large orbital fracture from the evil looking kick he received from Shinsuke Nakamura at the NXT house show last week in California.
Aries is slated to undergo surgery later this week in Birmingham, Alabama and will be out of action at least until first quarter of 2017.
Link: http://pwinsider.com/article/105690/austin-aries-injury-updateand-it-isnt-good.html?p=1
